attributes.action: Investigate Peter 'mandy' Mandleson, for being a misserable sod
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Peter 'Mandy' Mandleson is a top notch miserable, spoil sport sod. 

This is in particular reference to the news coverage of his plan to introduce, so called, piracy laws.

But, and I think everyone will agree, if the investigation goes ahead I'm sure it will uncover more miserabilities spoiling of sports / activities.

Come on PM, do it for the people.

All my Love
Rich.
Peter Mandleson indifference party

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
